name: kanban-comparison
description: Framework comparison project: Same app built in 10 frameworks

scripts.measure:all: npm run measure:final && npm run generate:charts
scripts.build:all: for dir in kanban-*/; do (cd "$dir" && npm run build); done
scripts.setup:all: for dir in kanban-*/; do (cd "$dir" && if grep -q '"setup"' package.json 2>/dev/null; then echo "\nüîß Setting up $dir..." && npm run setup; else echo "\n‚è≠Ô∏è  Skipping $dir (no setup script)"; fi); done

author: Loren Stewart
